explains: vt. 浓缩（condense 的过去分词）
wordGroup: condensed water 冷凝水；凝结水
condensed matter 冷凝物质，凝聚物质；凝聚体；高分子物理
condensed matter physics 凝聚态物理；凝聚物理学

sentences.en: The author has condensed a great deal of material into just 100 pages.
sentences.cn: 作者在短短100页中浓缩了大量信息。

sentences.en: The steam was condensed rapidly by injecting cold water into the cylinder.
sentences.cn: 由于汽缸中注入了冷水，蒸汽迅速凝结了。

sentences.en: Radars used to track storms can detect water in the atmosphere only once it has condensed into clouds or raindrops.
sentences.cn: 用于跟踪风暴的雷达只能在大气中凝结成云或雨滴后才能够探测到水。
